services.title: Our Services
services.dailyCleaningDesc: Professional daily cleaning service to keep your home always tidy
services.deepCleaningDesc: Thorough deep cleaning to completely remove stubborn stains
services.commercialCleaningDesc: Professional cleaning services for commercial premises
services.applianceCleaningDesc: Professional cleaning of various appliances to extend their lifespan

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a professional company dedicated to providing comprehensive cleaning and maintenance services for families and businesses. We adhere to the service philosophy of "professional, efficient, and thoughtful".

professionalTeam.title: Professional Team
professionalTeam.description: Our service personnel are rigorously trained, technically proficient, and certified.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: We use high-quality environmentally friendly materials and tools, strictly control service quality, and provide after-sales service guarantees.

efficientResponse.title: Efficient Response
efficientResponse.description: Quickly respond to your needs, flexibly arrange service times, and promptly solve your problems.

step1.title: Online Ordering
step1.description: No need for repeated communication, easily done online. Place an order online, the system will intelligently assign the order, and you will immediately receive a confirmation notification, with everything under control.

step2.title: Professional Execution
step2.description: A professional team will arrive on time, strictly adhering to standardized service procedures. We use efficient equipment and environmentally friendly materials.

step3.title: After-sales Guarantee
step3.description: During the period, if you have any questions or dissatisfaction with the service, we will respond immediately and resolve them quickly, ensuring your complete peace of mind.

footer.tagline: A professional company dedicated to providing comprehensive cleaning and maintenance services for families and businesses.
